While this is fairly OK I would not spend a long time watching it. A couple of the girls are OK, one is not a girl (see knees). If you really want, get, otherwise think twice.

I have been watching this New DVD for the past four days. I am amazed at how natural the ladies look while swimming underwater. Their eyes are open as if on land, and they all seem to smile.  The clarity of the picture is just perfect.  It is as if the five females where shot on land with expensive and professional lights, yet they are underwater.  How Did they Do This?  I find the choices of music and color the DVD provides, lets me set the mode in my own space for whatever event I am hosting.  The swimming goes on and on.  The ladies never seem to run out of breath, I sware they move like mermaids, so real and fish like, yet human, and HOT!  Why watch fish in a tank, when I get five half fish, half human MERMAIDS, who smile at me as I smile back.  If you are into background aumbiance, get this DVD Today. And don't get wet as the five swish their tale at you.

I just got this DVD, and it is awesome!  I have several DVD's for ambience, during parties, or just to have a nice background going on my 65" Panasonic plasma TV.  Anyway, this thing completely blows away any fireplace or fishtank video out there.  Totally unique concept.  The girls are tasteful, athletic, and really fun to watch.  When I put it in for the first time to watch, my wife and mother-in-law were both here, and they even thought it was cool.  Really makes you want to go to Australia on vacation.

The sound-track is excellent, and it is like you are watching an aquarium of mermaids swimming by, or a visit to Atlantis.  On the big TV, the girls are literally life-sized.  I can't wait to put this video up as background ambience during my next party.  Its just unlike any video I have ever seen before.  I highly recommend it.
